modName: Skyrim - Player Re-Voiced - Elven Races Complete - Male - Dawnguard - Hearthfire - Dragonborn Compatible
summary: This mod, dubbed Skyrim: Player Re-Voiced - Elven Races Complete, was created and voiced by Elder Scrolls fan and professional voice actor Casey Mongillo. Casey has voiced in several video games and cartoons, such as Zetman, Red Dead Redemption, Star Trek Online, Tony Hawk's Project 8 and more. COMPATIBLE WITH SKYRIM: LEGENDARY EDITION
descriptionHtml:
This mod, dubbed Skyrim: Player Re-Voiced - Elven Races Complete, was created and voiced by Elder Scrolls fan and professional voice actor Casey Mongillo. Casey has voiced in several video games and cartoons, such as ZETMAN, RED DEAD REDEMPTION, STAR TREK ONLINE, TONY HAWK'S PROJECT 8, UNDEAD NIGHTMARE and more.

Skyrim Player ReVoiced allows the player to experience Skyrim with a voice that is more suitable for their younger, or less masculine male elves. Every single sound the player makes throughout Skyrim has been re-voiced, from breathing sounds while sprinting, to battle cries, all the way to each and every dragon shout. Additionally, there is a new voice effect for when players become werewolves*.

*The werewolf transformation sound is universal to all characters and therefore is an optional download. You can download it directly on http://www.caseymongillo.com/skyrim

NOTE: This mod also fixes a glitch where there is no taunt for the "Throw Voice" shout.


[size="5"][b]EXTRA STUFF:

Visit my Website - [url=http://www.caseymongillo.com]http://www.caseymongillo.com[/url]

Visit my facebook - [url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Casey-Mongillo/184738221581303]http://www.facebook.com/pages/Casey-Mongillo/184738221581303[/url]

Follow me on Twitter - [url=http://twitter.com/#!/CaseyTheVA]http://twitter.com/#!/CaseyTheVA[/url][/size][/b]



[center][youtube]jnjlEp4p0t4[/youtube][/center]

For Japanese Players: ?????????

WORKS WITH SKYRIM LEGENDARY EDITION!
author: Casey Mongillo
